snippet.title: "Pythagoras' Perpetual Motion Machine" trailer
snippet.description:
A puzzle game featuring "perpetual motion machine".
Go to the atop of the tower, guided by a mysterious voice...


What awaits you at the end of your adventure?
A huge volume with more than 40 stages.

Helping tips and skip function support your adventure.


【iOS】https://goo.gl/bZVFEb 
【Android】https://goo.gl/pQSuQV
